titleStmt.title: Fry Surprised at Growth of Town

bibl.title: Untitled
Fry Surprised at Growth of Town
Spencer News

body.p: E.A. Fry, founder of the Lake Andes Wave was in town over Sunday visiting at the A. Amundson home and also with old friends. It has been about four years since Mr. Fry left and to say that he was surprised at the growth the town has made during that time would be putting it mildly. He is now located at Niobrara, Nebraska, and is writing a history of Knox county. Mr. Fry informed us that the reputation of our lake as a fishing and hunting resort had spread far and wide and that he was going to spend a few days this summer trying his luck with members of the finny tribe.
